import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "./StockManagement.css"; import { supabase } from "../../config/supabaseClient"; const StockManagement = () => { const fileInputRef = useRef(null); const [foodItem, setFoodItem] = useState({ itemName: "", category: "", price: 0, qtyOnHand: 0, discountPercentage: 0, expirationDate: "", image: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFoodItem({ ...foodItem, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value], }); }; const [image, setImage] = useState(null); const [imageUrl, setImageUrl] = useState(""); const handleImage = (e) => { setImage(e.target.files[0]); }; const handleImageUpload = async () => { if (!image) { alert("Please Select the Image"); return; } const fileName = `${Date.now()}-${image.name}`; const { data, error } = await supabase.storage .from("mosburger") .upload(fileName, image); if (error) { console.error("upload eroor :", error); } const { data: urlData } = supabase.storage .from("mosburger") .getPublicUrl(fileName); let imageUrl = urlData.publicUrl; setImageUrl(imageUrl); console.log("image url:", imageUrl); return imageUrl; }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await handleImageUpload(); }; return (
